meanings.definition: A benign tumor of muscular and fibrous tissues, typically developing in the wall of the uterus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that fibroids are growths in the uterus.
meanings.sent2: Many women may have fibroids without experiencing any symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The fibroids in the uterus decided to throw a party, but it was a very quiet affair.
meanings.sent4: Her uterus felt like a garden with fibroids blooming like flowers.
meanings.sent5: The image of fibroids in the uterus stuck in her mind like a stubborn stain.

meanings.definition: A noncancerous growth in the uterus that can develop during a woman's childbearing years.
meanings.sent1: During her check-up, the doctor discovered fibroids in her uterus.
meanings.sent2: Fibroids can sometimes cause heavy menstrual bleeding.
meanings.sent3: The fibroids in the uterus seemed to have a mind of their own, growing at their own pace.
meanings.sent4: Her uterus felt like a crowded city with fibroids as busy residents.
meanings.sent5: The presence of fibroids in the uterus was as noticeable as a bright neon sign.
